content:
ted public mirroring**: readable by anyone with the URL, difficult to
discover without it. Use redaction and the `public` flag to control exposure; rotate nonce
periodically to reduce link persistence. Writes remain in your private API; the mirror is
read‑only.
Iterative Changelog (This Response)
• exporter.py v1.3 — NEW: nonce path + filename, rotation with TTL, pruning, pretty
JSON.
• .gitignore — NEW: exclude local nonce trackers.
• Guide — NEW: nonce‑only URLs, setup, cron, rotation, verification, troubleshooting.
